education_tips.diversification_importance: Diversification across different asset classes (equities, debt, gold, crypto) is crucial to spread risk. If one asset class underperforms, others may compensate, leading to a more stable overall portfolio return.
education_tips.long_term_perspective: For a 12-year investment horizon and a high-risk portfolio, maintaining a long-term perspective is vital. Short-term market volatility is normal; staying invested allows time for assets to recover and grow.
education_tips.rebalancing_strategy: Periodically rebalance your portfolio to maintain your desired asset allocation. This involves selling assets that have grown significantly and buying those that have underperformed to bring the portfolio back to its target weights.
education_tips.understanding_risk: Understand that a high-risk portfolio comes with the potential for higher returns but also higher losses. Be comfortable with significant market fluctuations and only invest capital you can afford to lose without impacting your financial stability.
